verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came again to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> there were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H517>mother:<s%>

and they played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> they played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in their <S%H5271>youth;<s%> there were their <S%H7699>breasts<s%> <S%H4600>pressed,<s%> and there was handled the <S%H6213>bosom<s%> of their <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

Their <S%H8034>names<s%> were <S%H170>Oholah<s%> the <S%H1419>elder,<s%> and <S%H172>Oholibah<s%> her <S%H269>sister:<s%> and they became <S%H3205>mine,<s%> and they bore <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> As for their <S%H8034>names,<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H170>Oholah,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H172>Oholibah.<s%>
<S%H170>Oholah<s%> played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> when she was <S%H8478>mine;<s%> and she <S%H5689>doted<s%> on her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> on the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%>

who were <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> all of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> young <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

She <S%H5414>bestowed<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> on <S%H4005>them,<s%> the choicest <S%H1121>men<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> all of <S%H5689>them;<s%> and on whoever she doted, with all their <S%H1544>idols<s%> she defiled <S%H2930>herself.<s%>

Neither has she <S%H5800>left<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> since the days of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for in her <S%H5271>youth<s%> they <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H6213>her,<s%> and they handled the <S%H1717>bosom<s%> of her <S%H1331>virginity;<s%> and they <S%H8210>poured<s%> out their prostitution on <S%H8457>her.<s%>
Therefore I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> her into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H157>lovers,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> on whom she <S%H5689>doted.<s%>

These <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they <S%H3947>took<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and her they <S%H2026>killed<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and she became a <S%H8034>byword<s%> among <S%H802>women;<s%> for they <S%H6213>executed<s%> judgments on <S%H8196>her.<s%>

Her <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H172>Oholibah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7843>this,<s%> yet was she more corrupt in her <S%H5691>doting<s%> than <S%H8457>she,<s%> and in her prostitution which were more than the <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> of her <S%H269>sister.<s%>

She <S%H5689>doted<s%> on the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> her <S%H7138>neighbors,<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> most <S%H4358>gorgeously,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> all of them <S%H2531>desirable<s%> young <S%H970>men.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she was <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> they <S%H8147>both<s%> took <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

She <S%H3254>increased<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitution;<s%> for she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H2710>portrayed<s%> with <S%H8350>vermilion,<s%>

<S%H2289>dressed<s%> with <S%H232>girdles<s%> on their <S%H4975>waists,<s%> with <S%H5628>flowing<s%> <S%H2871>turbans<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> all of them <S%H7991>princes<s%> <S%H4758>to<s%> look <S%H1823>on,<s%> after the likeness of the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> in <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4138>birth.<s%>
As <S%H5869>soon<s%> as she <S%H4758>saw<s%> them she <S%H5689>doted<s%> on <S%H7971>them,<s%> and sent <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to them into <S%H3778>Chaldea.<s%>

The <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to her into the <S%H4904>bed<s%> of <S%H1730>love,<s%> and they <S%H2930>defiled<s%> her with their <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> and she was <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with <S%H5315>them,<s%> and her soul was alienated from <S%H3363>them.<s%>

So she <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> then my <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H3363>alienated<s%> from <S%H5315>her,<s%> like as my soul was <S%H5361>alienated<s%> from her <S%H269>sister.<s%>

Yet she <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> her <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> <S%H2142>remembering<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> in which she had played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

She <S%H5689>doted<s%> on their <S%H6370>paramours,<s%> whose <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is as the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and whose <S%H2231>issue<s%> is like the <S%H2231>issue<s%> of <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

Thus you called to <S%H6485>memory<s%> the <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> in the <S%H6213>handling<s%> of your <S%H1717>bosom<s%> by the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for the <S%H7699>breasts<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H172>Therefore,<s%> Oholibah, thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5782>Behold,<s%> I will raise up your <S%H157>lovers<s%> against <S%H5315>you,<s%> from whom your soul is <S%H5361>alienated,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> them against you on every <S%H5439>side:<s%>

the <S%H1121>Babylonians<s%> and all the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H6489>Pekod<s%> and <S%H7772>Shoa<s%> and <S%H6970>Koa,<s%> and all the <S%H1121>Assyrians<s%> with <S%H2531>them;<s%> desirable young <S%H970>men,<s%> <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers<s%> all of <S%H5461>them,<s%> princes and <S%H970>men<s%> of <S%H7392>renown,<s%> all of them riding on <S%H5483>horses.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> against you with <S%H2021>weapons,<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H1534>wagons,<s%> and with a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> they shall <S%H7760>set<s%> themselves against you with <S%H6793>buckler<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H6959>helmet<s%> all <S%H5439>around;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>commit<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H8199>them,<s%> and they shall judge you according to their <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> against <S%H6213>you,<s%> and they shall deal with you in <S%H2534>fury;<s%> they shall take <S%H5493>away<s%> your <S%H639>nose<s%> and your <S%H241>ears;<s%> and your <S%H319>residue<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and your <S%H319>residue<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
They shall also <S%H6584>strip<s%> you of your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and take <S%H3947>away<s%> your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

Thus will I make your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H2184>you,<s%> and your prostitution brought from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> so that you shall not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H2142>them,<s%> nor remember Egypt any <S%H4714>more.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will deliver you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them whom you <S%H8130>hate,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them from whom your <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H5361>alienated;<s%>

and they shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you in <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> and shall take <S%H3947>away<s%> all your <S%H3018>labor,<s%> and shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bare;<s%> and the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H2183>prostitution<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> both your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitution.<s%>

These things shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2181>you,<s%> because you have played the prostitute <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and because you are <S%H2930>polluted<s%> with their <S%H1544>idols.<s%>
You have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H269>sister;<s%> therefore will I <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H3563>cup<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> You will <S%H8354>drink<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup,<s%> which is <S%H6013>deep<s%> and <S%H7342>large;<s%> you will be <S%H6712>ridiculed<s%> and held in <S%H3933>derision;<s%> it <S%H3557>contains<s%> <S%H4767>much.<s%>

You shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7943>drunkenness<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> with the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

You shall even <S%H8354>drink<s%> it and drain it <S%H4680>out,<s%> and you shall <S%H1633>gnaw<s%> the broken <S%H2789>pieces<s%> of <S%H5423>it,<s%> and shall tear your <S%H7699>breasts;<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5002>it,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7911>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have forgotten <S%H7993>me,<s%> and cast me <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1458>back,<s%> therefore you also <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitution.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover to <S%H1121>me:<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H170>Oholah<s%> and <S%H172>Oholibah?<s%> then <S%H5046>declare<s%> to them their <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

For they have committed <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and with their <S%H1544>idols<s%> have they committed <S%H5003>adultery;<s%> and they have also caused their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> whom they <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5674>me,<s%> to pass through the fire to them to be <S%H402>devoured.<s%>
Moreover this they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H2930>me:<s%> they have defiled my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths.<s%>

For when they had <S%H7819>slain<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%> to their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> then they <S%H935>came<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H6213>it;<s%> and behold, thus have they done in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H637>Furthermore<s%> you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>far,<s%> to whom a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> was <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H935>behold,<s%> they came; for whom you did <S%H7364>wash<s%> <S%H3583>yourself,<s%> paint your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H5710>decorate<s%> yourself with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%>

and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on a <S%H3520>stately<s%> <S%H4296>bed,<s%> with a <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6186>prepared<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7760>it,<s%> whereupon you set my <S%H7004>incense<s%> and my <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> being at <S%H7961>ease<s%> was with <S%H582>her:<s%> and with men of the common <S%H7230>sort<s%> were <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5436>drunkards<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and they <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on their <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H8597>twain,<s%> and beautiful <S%H5850>crowns<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> of her who was <S%H1087>old<s%> in <S%H5004>adulteries,<s%> Now will they <S%H2181>play<s%> the prostitute with <S%H8457>her,<s%> and she with them.

They went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H935>her,<s%> as they go in to <S%H802>a<s%> <S%H2181>prostitute:<s%> so went they <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H170>Oholah<s%> and to <S%H172>Oholibah,<s%> the <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H802>women.<s%>

<S%H6662>Righteous<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> them with the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H5003>adulteresses,<s%> and with the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of women who <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> because they are <S%H5003>adulteresses,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I will bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> against <S%H5414>them,<s%> and will give them to be <S%H2189>tossed<s%> back and forth and <S%H957>robbed.<s%>

The <S%H6951>company<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H1254>dispatch<s%> them with their <S%H2719>swords;<s%> they shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and burn <S%H8313>up<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Thus will I cause <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that all <S%H802>women<s%> may be <S%H3256>taught<s%> not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after your <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

They shall <S%H5414>recompense<s%> your <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> on <S%H5375>you,<s%> and you shall bear the <S%H2399>sins<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
